query:
SELECT a.actor AS "actor!", did, also_known_as
            FROM UNNEST($1::TEXT []) AS a(actor)
            INNER JOIN plc.dids ON
                (
                    did = a.actor OR
                    also_known_as && ARRAY[a.actor, 'at://' || a.actor]
                ) AND
                EXISTS (
                    SELECT *
                    FROM follows.dids
                    WHERE follows.dids.did = plc.dids.did
                )
